exception restaurant_client.FoursquareAuthError

Bases: RuntimeError

Raised when the API key is missing or invalid (401/403).

exception restaurant_client.FoursquareRequestError

Bases: RuntimeError

Raised for non-auth API errors (4xx/5xx).
